title: Vikasa Yoga Retreat and Restaurant
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, International, Raw, Thai, Western, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Vikasa Retreat is a place of relaxation and peace. Its organic and raw food cafe menu was created by four international chefs and features fresh, locally grown, organic, and lightly cooked vegetarian meals with local seafood options. The menu is designed to cleanse and facilitate detoxification of your body during your retreat. Sample items might include breakfast oat porridge and pancake; Thai soups and main entrees with rice, curry, and noodle; juicy wraps and rolls and salads. Beside yoga and teacher training, Vikasa also offers raw chocolate making classes. Current location since Sept 2012.
